title: Gemini 2.5 Flash returns empty LLM response on first turn
description:
Gemini 2.5 Flash returned a completely empty response from the LLM API on its very first turn, causing a wasted action cycle. The harness had to retry.

Evidence from game_20260209_184021: Empty response logged from Gemini 2.5 Flash at the start of the game.

This may be a transient API issue, but the harness should handle empty responses gracefully — either retry automatically or pass priority rather than wasting a full action cycle.

Game log: ~/mage-bench-logs/game_20260209_184021/
